sourceDesc.p: Generated from the Microsoft Word Document Books to Read.doc.

listChange.change: Added series to most books that needed them.

list.item: changed catRef to trait for validation purposes; and
started using date with type of "added" to keep track of how long items stay on this list.

listChange.change: Created the first version of this list in Microsoft Word.
